children.subject: Yes you can expect changes to other classes as well.
Is this ONLY applicable to C8, 61A, 61C, and 189, because I've seen 160, 126, and 176 all change their days/times this past week as well. Could we expect changes to other classes?
Check classes.berkeley.edu for actual times. It was moved so they could have a larger room on campus.

I've noticed that CS 70 showed different schedule times in the Schedule Planner compared to the Enrollment Shopping Cart as well. Can someone please confirm the correct time

Schedule Planner : Tu/Th 9:30-11:00 AM @ VLSB 2050

Enrollment Shopping Cart: Tu/Th 3:30-5:00 PM @ Wheeler 150
That's why enrollment for the affected classes is closed.

not talking about that. if i enroll in a class for my minor and the rescheduled 61c ends up being at the same time, i'll have a final exam conflict. i need to use phase 1 units on classes for my minor because most seats are reserved.

This could easily be a minor disaster waiting to happen if this isn’t resolved soon.  I am taking CS61C and have a couple of classes that fill up very quickly. Not too worried about the lecture times based on what I see in Berkeleytime, but very much worried about picking a discussion time that might lead to a conflict.

so for those of you worried about conflicts for CS 61C changing its time with some other lecture or discussion, here is the Wheeler 150 schedule for Fall 2019, with the big assumption that CS 61C will remain at Wheeler 150:

none 8-9 **

MATH 1A MWF 9-10
ECON 1 MW 10-11
COMPSCI 61A - MWF 11-12 **
INTEGBI 35AC MWF 12-1
UGBA 10 MWF 2-3
COMPSCI 61C - MWF 3-4 **
POLSCI 179 W 4-5
COMPSCI 61B - MWF 5-6
NUSCTX 10 MW 6-7

COMPSCI C100 - TTH 930-11
MCELLBI 62 - TTH 11-1230
EE 16A - TTH 1230-2
COMPSCI 188 TTH 2-330
COMPSCI 70 TTH 330-5

none 5-630 **

none 630-8 **

so it seems like the only unsafe times would be TTH 5-630 and 630-8 (didnt find any courses that were using Wheeler 150 at that time), or maybe MWF 12-1, since that's the CS 61A time slot that apparently is also subject to change.  Unfortunately, one of the classes that I had the big worry about, STAT 140, is TTH 630-8.
oops again ECON100A TTH 5-630 is at Wheeler 150 this Fall.
Will final exam makeups exist for these classes? (Specifically 61C). If we end up using our Phase 1 units on a conflicting class, we won't be able to switch afterwards.
nevermind i realized that they are on different days.
Is it still possible for us to take 61c and 70 together? They have overlapping class times but I know one or the other or both will have webcast.

No - keep watching classes.berkeley.edu. We hope to get the room situation sorted out by the end of this week if we can. Check classes.berkeley.edu daily & if you see it open for enrollment (no Dept Consent required) then you know that the room has been assigned & the day/time of the class are accurate.
It says wheeler 150 MWF 3-4pm. But the lecture status is waitlist. What does this mean?

Please read the original post information! Until the class is open for enrollment you CANNOT count on the day/time/location that is shown on the schedule. There is a lot of negotiating happening behind the scenes that could shift all of these closed classes (Which is what I said in the original post.)
So if we need to take 61c, should we just wait until after phase 1?

history.content:
URGENT - If you're planning to take any of these classes, read this message!!

Unfortunately there have been some issues with getting rooms for some of our larger CompSci classes. We have been, and continue to work diligently with Campus Scheduling to resolve this issue as soon as possible. Be aware that the meeting day/time and room location for these rooms is SUBJECT TO CHANGE! (In other words, it VERY likely will change.)

We have decided it is better to list the classes with the incorrect meeting information than to hide the class and have students think it is NOT being offered. We know this makes planning your F19 schedule nearly impossible and we are doing all we can to resolve the issue. 

What this means to you:

  • If you plan to enroll into any of the following classes, be aware that the class day/time/location information is NOT ACCURATE.
         CS C8 (Data 8)
         CS 61A
         CS 61C
         CS 189

  • We have CLOSED enrollment for these classes to prevent students from using phase 1 units in a class that may not fit their schedule. (This will show in the system as Dept Consent required with a single digit enrollment capacity.)

How you will know when the information is correct:

  • Watch for Piazza post(s) saying the problem has been fixed.
  • The class will show OPEN for enrollment.

Thank you for your patience as we work to resolve the issue.
history.subject: F19: CS Classes with changing meeting day/time and location: CS 189, CS 61A, CS 61C, CS C8
